title: Amir Tsarfati: How Close are we to the Mark of the Beast
cleaned_text: With the outbreak of the Coronavirus and the rising global pressure to push vaccinations, the move to cashless economies and stimulus plans with digital currencies, how close really are we to the mark of the beast and is it truly an issue for the believers to worry about?

opengraph.title: Amir Tsarfati: How Close are we to the Mark of the Beast - Behold Israel
